alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 04 at 3:34PM CDT until November 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ELLIS COUNTY... At 333 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Bardwell, or near Ennis, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Alma around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Reagor Springs, Crisp, Telico, Howard, Bristol, Garrett, Avalon and Boyce. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
